script.name: Menu.Anarkis.Pirate.Comm.RaidRequest
script.description: Menu: Pirate Guild - Comm : Stations : Raid Request

line.comment: * Short description of the menu, matches the *.SM version's varaible of the same name.
* The size of your settings, i.e. the number of elements to remember on your menu
* Version identifies if the menu settings 'memory' should be defaulted.
* The settings variable remembers all the things that should be remembered between page refreshes, and between menu openings
* $Ret = open custom info menu: title=$Title description=$Description option array=$Menu callback script='Menu.DynamicTemplate.SM' args=$Args maxoptions=10
* These are the actual default values, not indexes, of the settings
* The first element is always the settings version

sval.val: Menu: Pirate Guild - Comm : Stations : Raid Request
Short description of the menu, matches the *.SM version's varaible of the same name.
The size of your settings, i.e. the number of elements to remember on your menu
Version identifies if the menu settings 'memory' should be defaulted.
The settings variable remembers all the things that should be remembered between page refreshes, and between menu openings
$Ret = open custom info menu: title=$Title description=$Description option array=$Menu callback script='Menu.DynamicTemplate.SM' args=$Args maxoptions=10
These are the actual default values, not indexes, of the settings
The first element is always the settings version
